languages.text: Приказал{mf||а} спрятать еретический алтарь, чтобы он не причинил вреда мирным жителям.
Ordered that the heretical altar be hidden so that it could not harm innocent people.
languages.original_text: Приказал{mf||а} спрятать еретический алтарь, чтобы он не причинил вреда мирным жителям.

traits.locale_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be hidden so that it could not harm innocent people.
Ordered that the heretical altar be hidden so that it could not harm innocent people.

Ordered that the heretical altar be hidden so that it could not harm innocent people.
Ordered that the heretical altar be hidden so that it could not harm innocent people.

languages.text: 你命令把这座异端祭坛隐藏起来，以免无辜之人遭到伤害。
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be hidden so that it could not harm innocent people.

traits.locale_text: 你命令把这座异端祭坛隐藏起来，以免无辜之人遭到伤害。

languages.text: 異端の祭壇が無実の人々を傷つけることがないよう、隠すように命じた。
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be hidden so that it could not harm innocent people.

traits.locale_text: 異端の祭壇が無実の人々を傷つけることがないよう、隠すように命じた。

languages.text: Has ordenado que el altar herético se oculte para evitar daños a gente inocente.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be hidden so that it could not harm innocent people.

traits.locale_text: Has ordenado que el altar herético se oculte para evitar daños a gente inocente.

languages.text: Befohlen, dass der ketzerische Altar verborgen wird, damit er Unschuldigen nichts anhaben kann.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be hidden so that it could not harm innocent people.

traits.locale_text: Befohlen, dass der ketzerische Altar verborgen wird, damit er Unschuldigen nichts anhaben kann.

languages.text: Masum insanlara zarar vermemesi için kâfir sunağının saklanmasını emrettin.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be hidden so that it could not harm innocent people.

traits.locale_text: Masum insanlara zarar vermemesi için kâfir sunağının saklanmasını emrettin.

languages.text: Vous avez donné l'ordre de cacher l'autel hérétique pour l'empêcher de faire d'autres victimes innocentes.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be hidden so that it could not harm innocent people.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez donné l'ordre de cacher l'autel hérétique pour l'empêcher de faire d'autres victimes innocentes.
